# verticalBase

**Instance Property**

The orientation of the vertical portion of the correction.

## Declaration

```swift
var verticalBase: HKPrismBase { get }
```

## Discussion

This value can be either [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKPrismBase/in] or [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKPrismBase/out].

## Accessing lens specification data

- **eye**: A value indicating which eye the correction applies to.
- **HKVisionEye**: A value that specifies the eye for a vision prescription.
- **amount**: The strength of the correction.
- **angle**: The orientation of the adjustment.
- **horizontalAmount**: The strength of the horizontal correction.
- **horizontalBase**: The orientation of the horizontal portion of the correction.
- **verticalAmount**: The strength of the vertical correction.
- **HKPrismBase**: The orientation of the prism correction, represented by the location of the prism’s base (the thickest part of the prism).
